comments.author: Matt
comments.body: I have work commitments right up until noon. Unless we have other takers I will probably lumber up Flagstaff at half-past.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Man, you guys are pitiful. Get the heck out there (or "owwt there" as they say here in Canada)! At least I've been doing [my part](http://icegulch.com/gallery/pacific_nw07).
